sourcesContent:
<template>
  <g class="cursor" @mousedown="md($event, 1)" @touchstart="md($event,1)">
    <circle :cx='x' :cy='y' r="8" fill='black'/>
    <text class="label" :x='x + 12' :y='y'>Year</text>
    <text class="label" :x='x + 12' :y='y + 14'>Emissions</text>
    <line :x1='x' :x2='x' y1='0' :y2='height' stroke="black"/>
    <circle v-for='dot in dots' cx='4' cy='4' r="4" fill='red'/>
  </g>
</template>

<script>
import * as d3 from 'd3'

import emissionsData from '../assets/emissions.json'
import subEmissions from '../assets/subemissions.json'

export default {
  name: 'Animatedcursor',
  data () {
    return {
      emissions: emissionsData,
      subemissions: subEmissions,
      isMove: false,
      x: 0,
      y: 25,
      width: 1000,
      height: 600,
      data: []
    }
  },
  methods: {
    md (ev, val) {
      if (val === 1) {
        this.isMove = true
      } else { return null }
      document.addEventListener('mousemove', this.mm)
      document.addEventListener('mouseup', this.mu)
      document.addEventListener('touchmove', this.tm)
      document.addEventListener('touchend', this.mu)
    },
    mu () {
      this.isMove = false
      document.removeEventListener('mousemove', this.mm)
      document.removeEventListener('touchmove', this.tm)
      document.removeEventListener('touchend', this.mu)
    },
    mm (ev) {
      if (this.isMove) {
        this.x = ev.clientX - 360
      } else { return null }
    },
    tm (ev) {
      if (this.isMove) {
        this.x = ev.touches[0].clientX
      } else { return null }
    },
    dotScale () {
      var parseDate = d3.timeParse('%Y')
      this.emissions.forEach(function (d) {
        d.date = parseDate(d.Year)
      })
      var x = d3
        .scaleTime()
        .domain([d3.min(this.emissions, d => d.date), d3.max(this.emissions, d => d.date)])
        .rangeRound([0, 100])

      var y = d3
        .scaleLinear()
        .domain([0, 40000000])
        .range([0, 1000])

      return {
        x,
        y
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    dots () {
      const data = this.subemissions
      const scale = this.dotScale()
      // console.log(data)
      const dots = ['Public', 'Autoproduced', 'Aviation', 'Road', 'Other', 'Shipping', 'CommRes', 'Agriculture', 'Combustion', 'Production', 'Solvents', 'OtherProc', 'IndWaste']

      const newAreas = dots.map(function (item, i) {
        let sum
        for (let n = 0; n < i; n++) {
          sum = data.key
        }
        return scale.y(sum)
      })
      // console.log(newAreas)
      return newAreas
    }
  }
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="scss">
svg {
  position: absolute;
}
</style>
